A version of '''[[Minecraft Indev]]''' was released on '''February 13, 2010''',<ref>[[wordofnotch:387901149|That was a lot of work, but it should behave better now]] – The Word of Notch, February 13, 2010</ref> at 22:58 UTC.

== Changes ==
=== Mobs ===
'''[[File:Skeleton JE1.png|32px]] [[Skeleton]]s'''
* Now burned in [[daylight]].

'''[[File:Spider JE3 BE2.png|32px]] [[Spider]]s'''
* Now don't attacked the player in daylight unless provoked.
* Eyes now glow.

'''[[File:Zombie JE1.png|32px]] [[Zombie]]s'''
* Now burned in [[daylight]].

=== World generation ===
'''[[File:Starting House JE2.png|40px]] [[Starting House]]'''
* Now made of wooden planks and stone rather than mossy cobblestone.

=== Gameplay ===
'''General'''
* The game now kicks the player to the [[Title Screen]] after generating a world offline.

=== General ===
'''[[Music]]'''
* Now plays once again.

'''[[Sound]]s'''
* Now plays once again.

'''[[Options]]'''
* Allocated memory and free memory are only displayed if Show FPS is set to on.</onlyinclude>
** The memory displayer is now formatted with the §7 code (light gray).

== Fixes ==
'''From Indev 20100207-1703'''
* Slabs no longer cause lighting issues.

'''From Indev 20100211'''
* Hell worlds no longer start off fully bright before getting darkened.
